name: DSGVO Youtube
author: Eric-Oliver Mächler

sections.description:
With this plugin you can add your youtube videos as according to the gdpr regulations

Mit diesem Plugin setzen sie alle Youtube Videos DSGVO / GDRP korrekt ein.

New Features (in Beta / for testing)

There is a new shortcode with which the video no longer appears in a popup but replaces the thumbnail directly on the website. this means that after clicking on the thumbnail, the image is hidden and the video appears

Popup Background

now you can set the background colour of the popup yourself

Text-Editor

2 Buttons for add your correct youtube shortcode

P.S Wenn man das eigene Bild nicht austauscht, taucht das Headerbild des Plugin auf…

New multilangual

this plugin has now a instruction manual in german or english.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Unzip the Compressed file.
  2. Upload dsgvo-youtube to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in Dashboard.
  4. Read the Instructions and copy the code to your post or pages
sections.faq:
How to install this plugin?

Just follow this Steps
1. Unzip the Compressed file.
2. Upload dsgvo-youtube to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in Dashboard.
4. Read the Instructions and copy the code to your post or pages

In which languages is this plugin available?

English & German

You found a Bug?

Please send me a eMail to support@ericmaechler.com – then i can fix the Bug – thank you
